entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character in the story who is inclined to bow his head and express confidence in an inquiry.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as an entity that will be conducting an inquiry into the dementors' behavior.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a character in the story who snaps at Dumbledore and tries to change the subject of the hearing.

entities.name: madam bones
entities.description: Madam Bones is a character in the story who readsjusts her monocle and stares back at Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the subject of the hearing, accused of offenses under the Decree for the Reasonable Restriction of Underage Sorcery.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are entities that have attacked without authorization and are being investigated by the Ministry.

relationships.description: Dumbledore expresses confidence in an inquiry into the dementors' behavior, implying that he believes the Ministry will investigate.
